entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
